sentences.en: " Have they found that shepherd? "
sentences.cn: “ 他们把那个法布里吉奥找到了 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: A shepherd lost the whole of his flock by a dreadful illness.
sentences.cn: 由于一场可怕的瘟疫,牧羊人的一群羊都死光了.

sentences.en: For three nights, the shepherd maintained his lonely vigil.
sentences.cn: 牧羊人孤零零地连续看守了三个晚上.

sentences.en: He was so impressed that he inquired the young shepherd's name.
sentences.cn: 他深受震动，就问那个年轻的牧羊人叫什么名字。

sentences.en: He was, naturally, accompanied by the two shepherd bodyguards.
sentences.cn: 他也很自然地让那两个牧民保镖陪着.

sentences.en: In comparison, a German shepherd has a biting pressure of 750 pounds per square inch.
sentences.cn: 相比较，德国牧羊犬在咬牙时每平方英寸大约有750英镑的压力。

sentences.en: No, that’s the difference between a good and a bad shepherd.
sentences.cn: 不。 这是一个好牧羊人和一个坏牧羊人之间的差别。

sentences.en: The bead is put on the forehead of the dead shepherd ahead of the herd.
sentences.cn: 珠子被戴在畜群前面的死牧羊人的前额上。

sentences.en: The chevalier might boast with reason to the friends who visited him that few retired captains were more snugly quartered than he in his crib in shepherd's inn.
sentences.cn: 骑士完全有理由向前来拜访的朋友夸口，说他在牧羊人会馆的住所是他的安乐窝，退伍的上尉能象他这么逍遥自在的不多。

sentences.en: The Dead Sea scrolls were found by a shepherd pursuing a stray goat into a cave.
sentences.cn: 《死海经卷》是一个牧羊人到山洞寻找一只离群的山羊时发现的。

sentences.en: The king's shepherd , Faustulus , pushed his way into the room.
sentences.cn: 国王的牧羊人 福斯图鲁斯 闯进屋来.

sentences.en: The passenger were shepherd across the tarmac to the airliner.
sentences.cn: 旅客们被引领走过柏油碎石跑道上飞机.

sentences.en: The shepherd boy waited for his sheep to drink.
sentences.cn: 牧童等羊喝水.

sentences.en: The shepherd has penned up the sheep in the five - acre field.
sentences.cn: 牧羊人把羊群围在那块五英亩的土地上.

sentences.en: The shepherd re - collect his flock.
sentences.cn: 牧人重新聚集起他的羊群.

sentences.en: The shepherd tended a flock.
sentences.cn: 这个牧羊人照管羊群.

sentences.en: The shepherd went to search for some sheep that had strayed.
sentences.cn: 牧羊人去找走散的羊去了.

sentences.en: The shepherd would like to hear the pedigree of your life, father.
sentences.cn: 爹,羊倌会高兴听听你的身世经历的.

sentences.en: The tour guides shepherded the rest of the group onto the bus.
sentences.cn: 导游把团中的其他人带上了巴士

sentences.en: When he arrived, she was out with the shepherd.
sentences.cn: 当他到达时, 她跟牧羊人出去了.

words.tran_cn: 牧师,神父,神职人员,传教者,忏悔者
保护,防御,护卫,维持,护送

phrases.tran_cn: n. 澳大利亚牧羊犬；澳洲牧羊犬
德国牧羊犬；阿尔萨斯狼犬；德国警犬（等于German police dog）
n. 德国牧羊犬；阿尔萨斯狼犬

trans.tran_cn: 牧羊人，羊倌，牧师，指导者
trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to take care of sheep
to lead or guide a group of people somewhere, making sure that they go where you want them to go

trans.tran_cn: 带领，引导，牧（羊），放牧，照看
trans.tran_en: to lead or guide a group of people somewhere, making sure that they go where you want them to go
